Satisfactory is a first-person open-world factory building simulation game developed and published by Coffee Stain Studios. The game takes place on an alien planet where the player character has been sent to establish and maintain a massive automated factory complex. The goal is to explore the environment, gather resources, and build increasingly complex machines, buildings, and transportation systems in order to produce a variety of useful products.

The game offers a vast range of customization options, allowing players to create unique and efficient factory layouts to optimize production. The ultimate objective is to unlock all the available technology tiers, which unlocks even more manufacturing possibilities and expanding the factory to its highest potential.

Throughout the game, players will encounter hostile creatures and environmental challenges, which they must overcome to progress. Additionally, the game has a cooperative multiplayer mode that allows up to four players to work together towards the same goal. Satisfactory offers a dynamic and creative gameplay experience that offers endless possibilities to explore and experiment with.
